Comment: This ASSHOLE is not a Democrat -- he is calling for purging the left wing of the party as a prerequisite for his running for President.  The Democratic party has traditionally been a big tent, we don't need a mirror image of King Chump insulting the legacy of the one party which stands for inclusiveness and consensus-building.  Should the Democrats be stupid enough to nominate this Trump clone, they will lose bigly.   One more salient point -- Senator Barrack Obama was a relatively conservative (by Democratic norms) elected official when he successfully ran for President and was re-elected. He united the party and did not call for any mindless divisive purges.
